    All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values

    P

    PAUSED - Enum constant in enum class application.model.GameState
    Game is paused (ESC pressed); threads sleep/spin until resumed.
    pauseGame() - Method in class application.controller.GameController
    Pauses the game.
    peek() - Method in class application.model.tetromino.TetrominoBag
    Peeks at the next tetromino type without removing it from the bag.
    playBgm(String, double) - Method in class application.util.SoundManager
    Plays background music with a per-track volume multiplier applied on top of the global BGM volume slider.
    PLAYING - Enum constant in enum class application.model.GameState
    Game is actively running; all threads are ticking.
    playSfx(String, double) - Method in class application.util.SoundManager
    Plays a sound effect with a volume multiplier applied on top of the global SFX volume.
    popOverlay() - Method in class application.view.SceneManager
    Removes the topmost overlay if one exists.
    pushOverlay(Parent) - Method in class application.view.SceneManager
    Pushes an overlay on top of the current view.
